room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: 7 of us from Wings-n-Things wanted a night out together and chose this Escape room! It was fantastic! The staff, the rooms... Would definitely recommend and will definitely go back in a few months when they change themes! Ty so much for an incredible time!

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: I went here with a group of 8 two times. Had a great time on both occasions. The rooms were really fun and done really creative. The people that work here are also really nice and easy to talk to. Definitely would recommend

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: Went with the family. We had a blast. We were on our toes the whole time mot knowing what to expect.   We will be back

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: Absolutely FANTASTIC!! From the very beginning, the spooky decor had us prepared to run away (in a very positive way). We were terrified before even walking into the room and it felt amazing. William was extremely attentive to us

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: Such a awesome place been to one other escape room and this was alot different alot going. Fun and scary but difficult we barely made it out on time

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: Went in a group of four and really enjoyed it. Two of us did an escape room before and two were first timers. All four of us totally loved it! The time flew by as we searched for clues and solved puzzles. We made it out with seconds to spare. The management is awesome - really nice and helpful guy. Definitely recommend checking this escape room out!

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: As an avid escape room fan, I truly enjoyed this experience. My husband and I were teamed up with mom and her adult sons, all of whom were in it to win it...and we did! I am more well-versed in escape rooms that feature puzzles to solve the room and this one relied more on finding codes and keys. The facilities were not as 'polished' as some of the other escape rooms I've been to, but still a bunch of fun! I could tell they might still be working out the kinks and hope to see this venue so well. The team running the room seemed really passionate about it and would like to visit again once they change up the theme!

room_title: Escape room "The Underground Morgue" by Demented Escape Room in Miami
review: They were super cool! I wasn't expecting for it to be the way it did. Definitely deserves a 5 star! We barely made it out, laughed the entire time! I know it has a lot to do with who you go with but the ideas were awesome! They're changing in a couple of months and we're definitely coming back. I recommend it ! 100%.
